item.title: Easter Bunny Hip Hop
item.description:
The 'Easter Bunny Hip Hop' comes with one Polka Black watch face and one Robin's Egg Blue strap. The watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match faces and straps of all styles from your Modify collection. The strap is made from a soft and comfortable silicone material and the face is mad..

Price: $50.00
